t: Amazon.com : DayOne Response P&G Purifier of Water : Sports & Outdoors
s: Peg purifier of water is a powder that comes in small affordable, easy-to-use packets. It combines flocculation and disinfection to produce clean drinking water. Using some of the same ingredients used in municipal water systems, it is engineered to be a miniature truant plant in a packet.
